reviewText:
This isn't really a review. I just feel that Amazon doesn't give enough information about this DVD collection. I'm adding this so any potential buyer might to be able to make an informed purchasing decision. I hope it's useful.

Tale of the Mummy a.k.a. Talos the Mummy (1998) - 88 min - Adventure / Fantasy / Horror - Director: Russell Mulcahy - Stars: Jason Scott Lee, Louise Lombard, Sean Pertwee and Christopher Lee.

The Curse of King Tut's Tomb (2006) - TV Movie - 170 min - Adventure / Fantasy / Horror - Director: Russell Mulcahy - Stars: Casper Van Dien, Jonathan Hyde and Leonor Varela.

Allan Quatermain and the Temple of Skulls (Video 2008) - 98 min -  Action / Adventure - Director: Mark Atkins - Stars: Sean Cameron Michael, Christopher Adamson and Natalie Stone.

Blackbeard (2006) - TV Movie - 169 min - Adventure / Biography / Drama - Director: Kevin Connor - Stars: Angus Macfadyen, Mark Umbers and Richard Chamberlain.

Journey to the Center of the Earth a.k.a. Journey to Middle Earth (Video 2008) - 87 min - Action / Adventure / Sci-Fi - Directors: Davey Jones and Scott Wheeler - Stars: Greg Evigan, Dedee Pfeiffer and Jennifer Dorogi.

Robinson Crusoe (1997) - 105 min - Drama / Adventure - Directors: Rod Hardy and George Miller - Stars: Pierce Brosnan, William Takaku and Polly Walker.
Great mix of adventure movies. Good value pack of films. Worth buying.
All the movies are great! l would like to recommend this seller.
These movies don't even deserve a "B". They are like rejects from the Sci-Fi channel.  I would recommend you look for something better to spend your money on.
I am a fan of this type of film,so love having all available to me. The quality of the disks is excellent!
